marklogic.body:
To: Anna Hall
That's another impressive and factual comment you posted. You know a lot about dentition and dentistry. I'll add that bad teeth, also, produces Bad breath, which is intolerable in American society, which further boosts your preference for good teeth.
Above all, continue to use your American spellings. It's right, justified and grammatical. It's the language of the Internet, used almost globally.
Just beware of PBs. When you read some of my commentaries, you understand the history and what I represent in anti-PBism, along with why some of them just can't stay away or post bona fide, evidence-based comments. See you again online. Igonikon Jack, USA
